task.title: Removing Symbols from the Favorites List

context.p: The Favorites list contains the symbols which are inserted most often.
To remove a symbol from the Favorites list, do the following:

step.cmd: Remove a symbol from the Favorites list.

substep.cmd: Right-click the symbol in the Favorites table.
Select Remove from Favorites from the context menu.

fig.title: Removing a symbol from the Favorites list.

result.p: The symbol will be removed from the Favorites List.

fig.title: The symbol has been removed from the Favorites list.
